snippet: An American soldier was shipped out of Kunar Province after he was spotted expressing an unusual form of disrespect against President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan.
abstract: American soldier is shipped out of Kunar Province, Afghanistan, after he is spotted throwing stones at billboard depicting Pres Hamid Karzai; incident offers reminder that patience on both sides is wearing thin as war grinds on and that thoughtless acts can lead to international incidents.

byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Asadabad, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: An American soldier was shipped out of Kunar Province after he was spotted expressing an unusual form of disrespect against President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan.

headline.seo: U.S. Soldier Targets a Karzai Portrait, With Rocks
headline.main: G.I. Stones a Portrait of Karzai, Causing a Stir
headline.print_headline: G.I. Stones A Portrait Of Karzai, Causing a Stir

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
